trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Tigard
There were no other sightings in Tigard on or around June 9th 2013
Summary: Really bright light that I've never seen before. They were really different. I caught around 4-5 going in the same dirrection.
divs: Sighting Details1) I was just home from work 2) First thing I noticed was how crazy bright it was. It wasn't just about how bright, but how different the brightness looked. It wasn't like a flare in the sky, it was this weird bright object that was REALLY close. 3) My first thoughts were it was a UFO. Well maybe not a UFO UFO, but an object that didn't make sense. Nothing I've seen before. 4) It just went from N of my house to SW of my house. All 4 to 5 of them went from the same direction to the other end. 6) Lights got dimmer and dimmer and I think it's because it was going farther and farther away from me. I have photos and a 5 min video
